programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Modern Marvels: Food
programme.desc: Modern Marvels goes straight for the taste buds in an all-compassing celebration and exploration of food. Celebrated food expert Adam Richman crisscrosses the country taking a deep dive into how food products are made, detailing both the process of the craft and the inspiration behind the ideas.

programme.title: Bake Off: The Professionals S2
programme.desc: The toughest Bake Off of them all is back again. Twelve teams from across Britain compete to craft exquisite entremets, delicious desserts and spectacular showpieces. Who will impress world-renowned judges Benoit Blin and Cherish Finden, and be crowned the winner?

programme.title: Wilderness with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Adventurer Simon Reeve journeys deep into the heart of some of Earth's last great wildernesses. On our increasingly crowded planet there are still a few remote areas where nature has the upper hand: the last great wildernesses. In this series Simon Reeve ventures further into the unknown than he ever has before, to unlock its secrets and experience nature at its most beautiful and fragile.

programme.title: Survivor 46
programme.desc: 18 new castaways battle it out on the islands of Fiji for a million dollars and the title of Sole Survivor.

programme.title: Gigantosaurus S1
programme.desc: (Dual language English and Mandarin) Rocky, Bill, Tiny and Mazu are four young dinosaurs growing up in the Cretaceous period. programme.title: Power Rangers Dino Fury S29
programme.desc: When an army of powerful alien beings are unleashed on Earth, threatening life as we know it, a brand-new team of Power Rangers, fueled by the pre-historic power of the dinosaurs, are recruited to deal with the threat.

programme.title: PJ Masks S4
programme.desc: Instead of going to bed like all the other children, when our heroes get their pyjamas on, they magically transform into super heroes and become the PJ Masks!

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Pokemon Trainer Ash Ketchum has a new plan: see the world! But first, he and his partner Pikachu are headed to the opening of the Cerise Laboratory, a research facility dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Pokemon in every region. Ash meets Goh, another boy with boundless curiosity about Pokemon, and both are overjoyed when Professor Cerise asks them to become official research fellows.

programme.title: On The Red Dot
programme.desc: On The Red Dot offers weekly in-depth analysis and discussion on key issues and events that matter to Singaporeans.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: Crimewatch 2025
programme.desc: MALWARE PHISHING SCAM AND MONEY MULE OFFENCES A seafood craving turns into a financial nightmare when a victim loses more than $80,000 after downloading a seafood app embedded with malware. Watch how officers from the Anti-Scam Command take swift action to prevent further losses and unravel a money mule network.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2
programme.desc: Each episode of this cooking competition begins at the scene of the crime -- a kitchen that was just used to make an amazing, mouthwatering dessert that has since disappeared. To take the $100,000 prize, the competing dessert makers will need to prove they have the technical know-how, imagination and problem-solving skills needed to decode and re-create incredible desserts and cakes from across the world.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo: My Swedish Kitchen
programme.desc: Popular chef Rachel Khoo now lives in the Swedish countryside in a charming, traditional wooden house that serves as her base for the series. In every episode, she meets up with local food producers or a Swedish chef and visits stores and restaurants that focus on Swedish craftsmanship. Then it's back home to the kitchen, where she puts her twist on local recipes, preparing delicious, healthy food that's easy for anyone to cook at home.

programme.title: Lingo S4
programme.desc: Lingo is the fast paced word-play game that keeps on innovating for new audiences, with its mix of skill, tension, humour and the chance to win big cash prizes. Teams are pitted against each other in a battle to fill in the blanks and find words.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S42
programme.desc: Ryan Seacrest takes over as the new host for the well-loved gameshow.

programme.title: Sitting on a Fortune S2
programme.desc: Players can win up-to 100,000 in prize money in this high-stakes, high-tension game show hosted by Gary Lineker. But with no lifelines or chances to walk away they will risk everything on getting the right answer.

programme.title: Provocative
programme.desc: Sivan struggles to balance grief and fatherhood as Deepavali approaches. Farisha is overwhelmed by school and home, until an unexpected visitor shows up at her gate.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: (Live) The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood Eats Japan
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood has never been to Japan. As far as he's concerned, it's a land without bread - and a land without bread, is a land without bakers. This three-part series sees Britain's favourite baker discover just how wrong he was - and how Japan is fast becoming one of the world's top foodie destinations. Across the series, Paul travels the country sampling regional delicacies and gets taught some of Japan's most famous dishes.

programme.title: Matlock S1
programme.desc: Madeline Matlock rejoins the work force at a prestigious law firm, where she uses her wily tactics to win cases and expose wrongdoing.

programme.title: Sullivan's Crossing - Series 3
programme.desc: Maggie and Cal's romance intensifies, while Sully discovers shared connections with a new arrival, Helen.Meanwhile, Frank and Edna prepare for the arrival of Frank's cousin, and Lola has an awkward run-in with a handsome stranger on a girls' night out.

programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze are two young forest monsters that snuck in one day out of the rain. They are a brother and sister, who liked the place so much they decided to stay. Anyway, they're all living together in Bibi's magical house even though sometimes Hiccup and Sneeze don't really understand that being a monster and being a human are two very different things...

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C
programme.desc: Miss P learns that her Positive Agents have different feelings to describe different experiences! For example, Ling says she feels happy each time she completes a piece of art, Didi says she feels sad when she cannot get her dance steps right and Sham says that he feels excited when he goes on his adventure quests! The LETTER OF THE DAY is 'r' and the words are rock, rice and robot.

programme.title: 有何贵食
programme.desc: 民以食为天，人人都爱吃，不管是什么人。吃得好，吃得精已不稀奇，很多人更趋向于吃得奢华，吃得贵，吃得稀有。世界上有些食物或食材以价格昂贵出名。究竟它们有多贵？为何会卖得如此高价？是因为物以稀为贵？还是物以贵为稀？是为了搞噱头？还是背后有什么不为人知的苦衷？那它们的味道有什么特别？它们的烹调法又有何与众不同？想要品尝，得去哪里找？.

programme.title: 但愿人长久
programme.desc: 1953年那个初冬的早晨，台湾眷村里，邓家第四个孩子，“丫头”邓丽君（陈妍希饰）诞生。丫头在歌唱方面的才华幼时便已显现，无奈父亲邓枢（侯勇饰）坚决反对。邓枢退伍，开始了市场摆摊生涯。丫头不解父亲心中的抑郁和乡愁，但她成了父亲卖包子馒头的小帮手。小学毕业后，丫头未能考上初中。但已透过电台歌唱比赛获胜成为歌唱节目的固定班底。邓枢在市场摆摊与流氓发生冲突，被殴打成伤，还闹上了官司。深夜里，夫妇俩感慨这一切只因没有固定店面所致。丫头听在耳里，心疼父母，成为签约歌手并预支薪水，用这笔钱替父亲顶下了店面，邓枢知道后感动不已。丫头终于顺利登台，获得许多好评。.

programme.title: 阿麦从军

programme.title: 阿麦从军

programme.title: 猪仔馆人家
programme.desc: 一句老话道出亲情的真谛：血浓于水。然而，家族亲情能否禁得起时间的考验？猪仔馆是白肚鲳手里流传下来的一所老房子。在日本殖民统治时期，房子曾经着过一场大火。有传言说，是肚鲳曾经对某个房客耿耿于怀而痛下狠手。多年后，对性情古怪的祖父心怀不满，并对兄弟抱有偏见的杜家长孙金峰 (陈贵川)，密谋独占猪仔馆。他的阴谋会得逞吗？次孙金川 (姚王文隆) 天生疯癫，三孙子金海 (戴向宇)虽然聪明能干，但因纠缠于一段错综复杂的三角恋而最终沦落为瘾君子。莫非这些都是肚鲳遭到的报应？三兄弟与猪仔馆的命运将何去何从？.

programme.title: 在世界的角落扎营
programme.desc: 谢韵仪是公认的冒险玩家，而郭妃丽则是大家眼中的“贵妇”，两人却在近几年成为了好朋友。一起到泰国挑战种种户外活动的她们，会闹出什么样的笑话？在营火旁聊起了各自的恋爱经历和爱情观，她们又会透露出什么秘密？.

programme.title: 怪宿宿

programme.title: 余生正好

programme.title: 宠他，还是爱我

programme.title: 宠他，还是爱我
